Package gwt.material.design.client.data.infinite

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasLoader  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InfiniteDataCache<T>
    A Data Source for the InfiniteDataView, supports asynchronous calls expecting that InfiniteDataView.loaded(int, List, int, boolean) is called when ready.
    InfiniteDataView<T>
    The InfiniteDataView is designed for lazy loading data, while using minimal DOM row elements.
    The data source will invoke a load when the view index changes on scrolling.

    How to use: View size can be configured manually or can be set to dynamic view using InfiniteDataView.DYNAMIC_VIEW. Provide a valid DataSource implementation.
    InfiniteRenderer<T>
